paper_metadata.title: Key performance indicators for assessing inherent energy performance of machine tools in industries

energy_data.measurement_method: HC3390 power analyser with a sampling frequency of 500 kHz

additional_notes: This paper proposes key performance indicators (IEP) to assess the energy performance of machine tools, considering process controls in the usage phase. A systematic method is introduced to acquire the IEP indexes for developing energy-efficient machine tools and selecting matching machine tools.
